attributes.action: Over rule Hunts decision to impose new contracts on junior doctors
attributes.background: Jeremy Hunt has unfairly and undemocratically imposed new unacceptable contracts on junior doctors.  This needs to be over ruled and negotiations with the BMA resumed until a workable and fair contract can be agreed upon with no changes to current contracts until this has been done.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for clear action from the UK Parliament and Government. You could submit a petition calling on the Government not to impose new contracts on junior doctors.
